  • Method Details

    • createPathFromPoses

      public static <P, W, C, G> P createPathFromPoses(OnTheFlyPathing.PathFactory<P,W,C,G> factory, C constraints, G goalEndStateForHeading, boolean preventFlipping, Pose2d... poses)
      Create a path from poses using the provided factory and constraints.
      Parameters:
      factory - Adapter to an actual path library (e.g., PathPlanner)
      constraints - Library-specific constraints object
      goalEndStateForHeading - Library-specific goal/end-state object that captures desired final heading
      preventFlipping - If true, disables alliance flipping on the path
      poses - Waypoint poses (heading is direction of travel)
      Returns:
      Library-specific path object

    • createPathFromPoses

      public static <P, W, C, G> P createPathFromPoses(OnTheFlyPathing.PathFactory<P,W,C,G> factory, C constraints, G goalEndStateForHeading, boolean preventFlipping, List<Pose2d> poses)
      Convenience overload that takes a List of poses.

    • createWaypointsFromPoses

      public static <P, W, C, G> List<W> createWaypointsFromPoses(OnTheFlyPathing.PathFactory<P,W,C,G> factory, Pose2d... poses)
      Create waypoints directly from poses.

    • createPathFromWaypoints

      public static <P, W, C, G> P createPathFromWaypoints(OnTheFlyPathing.PathFactory<P,W,C,G> factory, C constraints, G goalEndStateForHeading, boolean preventFlipping, List<W> waypoints)

    • createPathFromPosesWithStart

      public static <P, W, C, G> P createPathFromPosesWithStart(OnTheFlyPathing.PathFactory<P,W,C,G> factory, C constraints, Object idealStart, G goalEndStateForHeading, boolean preventFlipping, Pose2d... poses)
      Create a path from poses and an optional library-specific start state.
      Parameters:
      factory - Adapter to an actual path library (e.g., PathPlanner)
      constraints - Library-specific constraints object
      idealStart - Library-specific start/initial state (nullable)
      goalEndStateForHeading - Library-specific goal/end-state object that captures desired final heading
      preventFlipping - If true, disables alliance flipping on the path
      poses - Waypoint poses (heading is direction of travel)

    • ppFromPoses

      public static com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPlannerPath ppFromPoses(com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathConstraints constraints, Rotation2d endHeading, double endVelocityMps, boolean preventFlipping, Pose2d... poses)
      Create a PathPlannerPath directly from poses (pose rotation is the travel heading).

    • ppFromPoints

      public static com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPlannerPath ppFromPoints(com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathConstraints constraints, Rotation2d endHeading, double endVelocityMps, boolean preventFlipping, List<com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPoint> points)
      Create a PathPlannerPath from path points (deprecated internal usage).

    • direct

      public static com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPlannerPath direct(Pose2d start, Pose2d end, com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathConstraints constraints, Rotation2d endHeading, double endVelocityMps, boolean preventFlipping)
      Direct path between poses using their pose rotations as travel headings.

    • arcViaOffsetMidpoint

      public static com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPlannerPath arcViaOffsetMidpoint(Pose2d start, Pose2d end, double offsetMeters, com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathConstraints constraints, Rotation2d endHeading, double endVelocityMps, boolean preventFlipping)
      Single-arc path via an offset midpoint. Positive offset = "left", negative = "right" relative to the start->end direction.

    • sCurve

      public static com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPlannerPath sCurve(Pose2d start, Pose2d end, double firstOffsetMeters, double secondOffsetMeters, com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathConstraints constraints, Rotation2d endHeading, double endVelocityMps, boolean preventFlipping)
      S-curve with two midpoints: first offset to the left, second to the right (or vice versa), producing a smooth "S".

    • variants

      public static Map<String,com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPlannerPath> variants(Pose2d start, Pose2d end, com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathConstraints defaultConstraints, Rotation2d endHeading, boolean preventFlipping)
      Generate a small library of variants you can pick from at runtime. Keys: "direct", "arcLeft", "arcRight", "sCurve", "slowApproach", "fastApproach", "corner", "manhattanX", "manhattanY", "auto"

    • auto

      public static com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPlannerPath auto(Pose2d start, Pose2d end, com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathConstraints constraints, Rotation2d endHeading, double endVelocityMps, boolean preventFlipping)
      Automatically chooses between "direct" and "corner" based on geometry. If the start and end headings suggest a sharp turn (L-shape) and the intersection is valid, it uses "corner". Otherwise, it uses "direct".

    • corner

      public static com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPlannerPath corner(Pose2d start, Pose2d end, com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathConstraints constraints, Rotation2d endHeading, double endVelocityMps, boolean preventFlipping)
      Creates a path that moves to the intersection of the start heading and end heading. If lines are parallel or intersection is invalid, falls back to direct.

    • manhattan

      public static com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPlannerPath manhattan(Pose2d start, Pose2d end, boolean xFirst, com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathConstraints constraints, Rotation2d endHeading, double endVelocityMps, boolean preventFlipping)
      Manhattan-style path: moves along X then Y (or Y then X).
      Parameters:
      xFirst - if true, moves along X axis first.

    • orbit

      public static com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPlannerPath orbit(Pose2d start, Pose2d end, Translation2d center, boolean clockwise, com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathConstraints constraints, Rotation2d endHeading, double endVelocityMps, boolean preventFlipping)
      Creates an arc path around a center point.
      Parameters:
      center - The center of rotation.
      clockwise - True for clockwise orbit, false for counter-clockwise.

    • buildChooser

      public static SendableChooser<String> buildChooser(Map<String,com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPlannerPath> variants, String defaultKey)
      Build a chooser for the variants (defaults to the first key found).

    • selected

      public static com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPlannerPath selected(SendableChooser<String> chooser, Map<String,com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathPlannerPath> variants)
      Resolve the currently selected path from a chooser + variants map.

    • constraints

      public static com.pathplanner.lib.path.PathConstraints constraints(double maxVelMps, double maxAccelMps2)
      Convenience factory for constraints (defaults angular + voltage).
